skills.name: Gruesome Alchemy
descriptions: Swap hands while holding an Alchemist's Bag to switch to Gruesome potions. These potions deal 80% of the magic damage of your Brutal potions and do not afflict damage over time. Instead, they apply 10% Slow, 10% Vulnerability, and 10% Weaken for 8s.
The Slow and Vulnerability are increased to 20%.
Your Gruesome potions now additionally paralyze (25% chance for 100% slowness for a second once a second) mobs for 8s.

skills.name: Brutal Alchemy
descriptions: Your Brutal Alchemist's Potions now apply a Damage Over Time effect which does 20% base damage as magic damage every second, over 8s. The damage dealt by this effect cannot be less than 1.
The Damage Over Time effect now does 35% base damage as magic damage.
Your Brutal Alchemist's Potions now apply a second Damage Over Time effect which does 20% base damage as magic damage every 2 seconds, over 8 seconds.

skills.name: Iron Tincture
descriptions: Crouch and right-click to throw a tincture. If you walk over the tincture, gain 6 absorption health for 50s, up to 6 absorption health. If an ally walks over it, or is hit by it, you both gain the effect. If it isn't grabbed before it disappears, it will quickly come off cooldown. When another player grabs the tincture, you gain 2 Alchemist's Potions. When you grab the tincture, you gain 1 Alchemist's Potion. Cooldown: 50s.
Effect and effect cap increased to 10 absorption health.

The tincture now grants 5% damage resistance when absorption is present, for the duration of the absorption. Additionally, mobs within a 3 block radius of the player who picks it up will be stunned for 1.5s.

skills.name: Alchemical Artillery
descriptions: Pressing the Drop Key while holding an Alchemist Bag and not sneaking launches a heavy bomb that explodes on contact with the ground, lava, or a hostile, or after 6 seconds, dealing 150% of your potion's damage and applying your selected potion's effects, in an area that is 150% of your potion's radius. The initial speed of the bomb scales with your projectile speed. This costs you 2 potions. 6s cooldown.
The damage of the bomb is increased to 250%

Add an aftershock to the explosion, which happens 1s after it, and deals 10% of the original explosion damage. If possible, the aftershock also applies the potion effect opposite of the one that you have selected.

skills.name: Empowering Odor
descriptions: Other players hit by your Alchemist's Potions are given 10% speed and 10% damage for 8s.
Your potion recharge delay is decreased by 0.5s.
The first hit a player would deal to an enemy after they gain this bonus is increased by 10%, refreshing on each application.

skills.name: Unstable Amalgam
descriptions: Shift left click while holding an Alchemist's Bag to consume a potion to place an Amalgam with 1 health at the location you are looking, up to 7 blocks away. Shift left click again to detonate it, dealing your Alchemist Potion's damage + 10 magic damage to mobs in a 4 block radius and applying potion effects from all abilities. The Amalgam also explodes when killed, or 3 seconds after being placed. Mobs and players in the radius are knocked away from the Amalgam. For each mob damaged, gain an Alchemist's Potion. Cooldown: 20s.
The damage is increased to 15 and the cooldown is reduced to 16s.

Enemies hit by the Amalgam's explosion become unstable for 8 seconds, and they are knocked straight up. When an unstable mob is killed, a potion that deals 40% of your potion damage is dropped at its location. These potions apply both Brutal and Gruesome effects, and bypass both normal and Alchemist Potion iframes.

skills.name: Energizing Elixir
descriptions: Left click while holding an Alchemist's Bag to consume a potion to apply 10% Speed and Jump Boost 2 to yourself for 6s. Cooldown: 2s.
Speed is increased to 20%; additionally, gain a 10% damage buff from all sources for the same duration.
Recasting this ability while the buff is still active refreshes the duration and increases the damage bonus and speed by 3%, up to 4 stacks. Stacks decay every 6s.

skills.name: Bezoar
descriptions: Every 5th mob killed within 16 blocks of the Alchemist spawns a Bezoar that lingers for 10s. Picking up a Bezoar will grant the Alchemist an additional Alchemist Potion, and will grant both the player who picks it up and the Alchemist a custom healing effect that regenerates 5% of max health every second for 2s and reduces the duration of all current potion debuffs by 10s.
The Bezoar now additionally grants +15% damage from all sources for 8s.
Every 10 bezoars spawned, summon a Philosopher's Stone instead. A Philosopher's Stone grants the Alchemist 3 potions, and gives the same effects as bezoars, while also granting 4 absorption for 16s.

specSkills.name: Taboo
descriptions: Swap hands while sneaking and holding an Alchemist's Bag to consume a potion and undergo a taboo transformation. While transformed, you recharge potions 0.5s faster, deal +15% magic damage, and gain 50% knockback resistance. However, you also lose 50% of your current absorption, and receive 50% less absorption and 50% less healing from every source.

The effect now grants you +25% magic damage. Additionally, while it is active, activate it again while looking down to consume another potion and enter burst mode, which gives you an additional +40% magic damage, but makes you lose 7% of your health per second, which bypasses resistances and absorption, but cannot kill you. This empowered effect lasts for 5s, and you cannot deactivate Taboo during it. Burst Cooldown: 20s

triggers.restriction: holding an Alchemist's Bag and Taboo is active

specSkills.name: Scorched Earth
descriptions: Sneak while throwing an Alchemist's Potion to deploy a 5 block radius zone that lasts 15s where the potion lands. Mobs in this zone are dealt 25% of your potion's damage and set on fire for 4s whenever taking damage of types other than ailment or fire. Cooldown: 30s.
Cooldown reduced to 25s, and 2 charges of this ability can be stored at once.

specSkills.name: Esoteric Enhancements
descriptions: When afflicting a mob with a Brutal potion within 1.5s of afflicting that mob with a Gruesome potion, summon an Alchemical Aberration. The Aberration targets the mob with the highest health within 8 blocks and explodes on that mob, dealing 80% of your potion damage and applying 20% Bleed for 4s to all mobs in a 3 block radius. Cooldown: 5s.
Damage is increased to 135% of your potion damage.

specSkills.name: Panacea
descriptions: Sneak Drop with an Alchemist Bag to shoot a mixture that deals 100% of your potion damage, applies 100% Slow for 1.5s, applies a 15% base magic Damage Over Time effect every 0.5s for 9s, and adds 2 absorption health to other players per enemy touched (maximum 16 absorption), lasting 24s. After hitting a block or traveling 14 blocks, the mixture traces and returns to you, able to damage enemies and shield allies a second time. Cooldown: 20s.
Absorption health added is increased to 4, Slow duration is increased to 2s, Damage Over Time is increased to 30% base magic damage.

specSkills.name: Transmutation Ring
descriptions: Sneak while throwing an Alchemist's Potion to create a Transmutation Ring at the potion's landing location that lasts for 10s. The ring has a radius of 5 blocks. Other players within this ring deal 15% extra damage on all attacks. Mobs that die within this ring increase the damage bonus by 1% per mob, up to 15% extra damage. Cooldown: 25s.
Mobs that die within this ring also increase its duration by 0.35s per mob, up to 5 extra seconds. Cooldown: 20s.

specSkills.name: Warding Remedy
descriptions: Swap hands while sneaking to give players (including yourself) within a 6 block radius 1 absorption health every 0.5s for 4s, lasting 30s, up to 6 absorption health. Cooldown: 30s.
You and allies in a 12 block radius passively gain 10% increased healing while having absorption health, and cooldown decreased to 25s.

skills.name: Celestial Blessing
descriptions: When you left-click while sneaking, you and all other players in a 12 block radius gain +20% melee and projectile damage and +20% speed for 15s. Dealing damage affected by this effect triggers Crusade to mark the enemy as undead, if applicable. Cooldown: 35s.
Increases the buff to +35% damage.
Magic damage is now increased as well. Cooldown: 30s.

skills.name: Cleansing Rain
descriptions: Right click while sneaking and looking upwards to summon a "cleansing rain" that follows you, removing negative effects from players within 4 blocks, including yourself, and lasts for 15 seconds. Cooldown: 45s.
Additionally grants 20% Damage Reduction to all players in the radius. Cooldown: 30s.
The radius increases to 6 blocks, and each player touched by the rain keeps its effect for the cast duration.

skills.name: Divine Justice
descriptions: Your critical melee or projectile attacks passively deal 5 magic damage to undead enemies, ignoring iframes.

Killing an undead enemy now passively heals 10% of your max health and heals players within 12 blocks of you for 5% of their max health. Damage is increased from 5, to 5 and 20% of your critical attack damage.

Undead killed have a 33% chance to drop Purified Ash which disappears after 10s. Clerics with this ability who pick it up get 2.5% increased undead damage for 20s. This effect stacks up to 15% and the duration is refreshed on each pickup. Bone Shards can be consumed from the inventory by right-clicking to get the max effect for 4 minutes.

skills.name: Hand of Light
descriptions: Right click while holding a weapon or tool to heal all other players in a 12 block cone in front of you or within 2 blocks of you for 2 hearts + 10% of their max health and gives them regen 2 for 4 seconds. Additionally, damage all mobs in the area with magic damage equal to 2 times the number of undead mobs in the range, up to 10 damage. If holding a shield, the trigger is changed to sneak + right click. Cooldown: 14s.
The healing is improved to 4 hearts + 20% of their max health. Damage is increased to 3 damage per undead mob, up to 12. Cooldown: 10s.

The cone is changed to a sphere of equal range, centered on the Cleric. The cooldown is reduced by 2% for each 4 health healed, capped at 50% cooldown. All Undead caught in the radius are stunned for 0.5s.

Whenever you are hit with a positive splash potion, the effects are also given to other players in a 12 block radius. In addition, whenever an undead mob you have hit within 1.5s dies or you deal damage to a boss (R1 100/R2 200/R3 300), you have a 10% chance to be splashed with an 20% Instant Health potion, with an additional effect of either Regen I, +10% Strength, +10% Resistance, +20% Speed, or +20% Absorption with a 20 second duration.
The chance to be splashed upon killing an undead mob is increased to 20%. The effect potions now give 40% Instant Health and the durations of each are increased to 50 seconds.
When a potion is created by this skill, also increase all current positive potion durations by 20% (up to a maximum of 2 hours, and up to 10 times per effect) on all players in the radius.
Your abilities now treat "human-like" enemies, such as illagers and witches, as Undead.
After being damaged or debuffed by cleric abilities, any mob will count as undead for the next 10s.
Gain 5% ability damage for every mob affected by this ability within 8.0 blocks, capping at 6 mobs.

skills.name: Illuminate
descriptions: Pressing the drop key will fire a holy projectile that travels for 24 blocks, leaving behind a 3.5-block wide trail that lasts for 6s and grants +20% Speed to all players inside it. Buffs linger for 4s upon leaving the area. Upon hitting a mob, block, or reaching its max distance, the projectile explodes, dealing 8 magic damage in a 4.5-block radius to all mobs and knocking them away. Cooldown: 14s.
The damage is increased from 8 to 13, and the trail's duration is increased from 6s to 8s. Additionally, players within the trail also gain +10% Strength. Cooldown: 12s.

A sanctified area is placed wherever Illuminate explodes, granting the same effects as the trail within a 6-block radius and lasting for the same duration. Enemies within Illuminate's trail take 1 magic damage every 0.5s.

skills.name: Sanctified Armor
descriptions: Whenever you are damaged by melee or projectile hits from an undead enemy, deal true damage to the undead based on its max health. For every 1% health the Cleric has above 70% max health, deal 1% of the undead's max health, up to a maximum of 15%. Damage is capped based on current region (R1 30/R2 60/R3 120 damage). This can only affect each mob once every 3s.

The Cleric's health threshold is reduced to 60%, and up to 25% of the undead's max health can be dealt (Capped at R1 50/R2 100/R3 200 damage). The undead enemy is also afflicted with 20% Slowness for 3s. This can only affect each mob once every 2s.
If the most recently affected mob is killed by any means other than Sanctified Armor or Thorns damage, regain half the health lost from the last damage taken.

specSkills.name: Holy Javelin
descriptions: While sprinting, left-clicking with a non-pickaxe throws a piercing spear of light, instantly travelling up to 12 blocks or until it hits a solid block. It deals 22 magic damage to all undead enemies in a 0.75-block cube around it along its path, and 11 magic damage to non-undead, and sets them all on fire for 5s. Attacking an undead enemy with that left-click transmits any passive Divine Justice and Luminous Infusion damage to other enemies pierced by the spear. Cooldown: 10s.
Damage is increased to 36 against undead, and to 22 against non-undead.

specSkills.name: Choir Bells
descriptions: While not sneaking, pressing the swap key afflicts all enemies in a 10-block radius with 10% slowness for 8s. Undead enemies also switch targets over to you, are dealt 6 magic damage, and are afflicted with 20% vulnerability and 20% weakness for 8s. Cooldown: 16s.
Slowness is increased from 10% to 20%. Vulnerability and weakness are increased from 20% to 35%.

specSkills.name: Luminous Infusion
descriptions: While sneaking, pressing the swap key charges your hands with holy light. The next time you damage an undead enemy, your attack is infused with explosive power, dealing 25 magic damage to it and all undead enemies in a 4 block radius around it, or 12 against non-undead, and knocking other enemies away from it. Cooldown: 12s.
Your melee attacks now passively deal 15% magic damage to undead enemies, and Divine Justice now passively deals 15% more total damage. Damaging an undead enemy now passively sets it on fire for 3s.

specSkills.name: Enchanted Prayer
descriptions: Swapping while sneaking enchants the weapons of all players in a 15 block radius with holy magic. Their next melee or projectile attack deals an additional 12 damage in a 3-block radius while healing the player for 10% of max health. Cooldown: 15s.
Damage is increased to 20. Healing is increased to 20% of max health.

specSkills.name: Thurible Procession
descriptions: The Hierophant passively builds up buffs, which are applied to all players in a 30 block radius. Buffs end and the buildup resets upon taking damage that causes you to drop below 60% of your max health, unless the full set of buffs have been obtained. Then all players (including the Hierophant) get 8 seconds of all built-up buffs. After these 8 seconds the timer resets and the Procession begins anew. Progression - +10% Attack Speed (after 4s of no health threshold reached), +10% Speed (after 8s of no health threshold reached), +10% Attack and Projectile Damage (after 12s of no health threshold reached), Cleric's passive heal is doubled, to 10% of max health every 5s (after 16s of no health threshold reached)

Progression - +15% Attack Speed (after 4s of no health threshold reached), +15% Speed (after 8s of no health threshold reached), +15% Attack and Projectile Damage (after 12s of no health threshold reached), Cleric's passive heal is tripled, to 15% of max health every 5s (after 16s of no health threshold reached)

specSkills.name: Hallowed Beam
descriptions: Left-click with a projectile weapon while looking directly at a player or mob to shoot a beam of light. If aimed at a player, the beam instantly heals them for 30% of their max health, knocking back enemies within 4 blocks. If aimed at an Undead, it instantly deals magic damage equal to your projectile damage to the target, and stuns them for one second. If aimed at a non-undead mob, it instantly stuns them for 2s. Two charges. Pressing Swap while holding a projectile weapon will change the mode of Hallowed Beam between 'Default' (default), 'Healing' (only heals players, does not work on mobs), and 'Attack' (only applies mob effects, does not heal). This skill can only apply Recoil twice before touching the ground. Cooldown: 16s each charge.

Hallowed Beam gains a third charge (and can apply Recoil three times before touching the ground), the cooldown is reduced to 12 seconds, and players healed by it gain 10% damage resistance for 5 seconds.

skills.name: Arcane Strike
descriptions: When you attack an enemy with a wand, you unleash an arcane explosion dealing 4 arcane magic damage to all mobs in a 4 block radius around the target. Enemies that are on fire or slowed take 2 extra damage. Arcane Strike can not trigger Spellshock's static. Cooldown: 5s.
The damage is increased to 7. Mobs that are on fire or slowed take 3 additional damage.
Your enchantment on-hit effects are now also applied to all other enemies hit in the radius. Also this skill's damage is increased by 40%.

skills.name: Elemental Arrows
descriptions: Your fully drawn projectiles are set on fire. If sneaking, shoot an ice arrow instead, afflicting the target with 20% Slowness for 6 seconds. Projectiles shot this way are magically infused, scaling off of magic damage instead of projectile damage. Ice arrows deal 8 extra damage to Blazes. Fire arrows deal 8 extra damage to strays. This skill can not apply Spellshock.

Your fire arrows also set nearby enemies within a radius of 3 blocks on fire when they hit a target. Your ice arrows also slow nearby enemies within a radius of 3 blocks when they hit a target. Both area of effect effects do 20% bow damage to all targets affected.
Your next elemental arrow every 8s also stuns enemies hit for 1s and deals 50% more damage.

skills.name: Frost Nova
descriptions: While sneaking, left-clicking with a wand unleashes a frost nova, dealing 5 ice magic damage to all enemies in a 7-block sphere around you, afflicting them with 20% slowness for 4s, and extinguishing them if they're on fire. Slowness is reduced by 10% on elites and bosses, and all players in the nova are also extinguished. The damage ignores iframes. Cooldown: 18s.
Damage is increased from 5 to 10. Base slowness is increased from 20% to 40%.
Damage is increased by 15% and cooldown is reduced to 16s. Non elites and bosses are frozen for 1s, having their AI and gravity removed.

skills.name: Magma Shield
descriptions: While sneaking, right-clicking with a wand summons a torrent of flames, dealing 6 fire magic damage to all enemies in front of you within 7 blocks, setting them on fire for 6s, and knocking them away. The damage ignores iframes. Cooldown: 12s.
Damage is increased from 6 to 12.
Enemies hit by this ability take 50% extra damage by fire and 35% by fire based abilities for 6s.

skills.name: Mana Lance
descriptions: Right clicking with a wand fires forth a piercing beam of Mana going 8 blocks, dealing 6 arcane magic damage to enemies in the path of the beam. This beam will not go through solid blocks. Cooldown: 5s.
The beam instead deals 7 damage. Cooldown: 3s.
Mana lance now has two charges.

skills.name: Spellshock
descriptions: Hitting an enemy with a spell inflicts static for 6 seconds. If an enemy with static is hit by another spell, a spellshock centered on the enemy deals 20% of the triggering spell's damage to all mobs in a 3 block radius. Spellshock can cause a chain reaction on enemies with static. An enemy can only be hit by a spellshock once per tick. If a static mob is struck by a melee attack, it takes 10% more damage on the hit and is slowed by 30% for 0.5 seconds, clearing the static.
Damage is increased to 30% for spells and 15% for melee. Additionally, gain +20% speed for 2 seconds whenever a spellshock is triggered.

Attacking enemies with Spellshock with an Arcane spell will grant you +3% speed for 6.0 seconds, stacking up to 5 times. Enemies that have Spellshock will take 20% more damage from your Fire spells, be slowed by 15% from your Ice spells for 6.0 seconds, and will be weakened by 20% from your Lightning spells for 6.0 seconds.

skills.name: Thunder Step
descriptions: Pressing the drop key while holding a wand materializes a flash of thunder, dealing 5 thunder magic damage to all enemies in a 4 block radius around you and knocking them away. The next moment, you teleport towards where you're looking, travelling up to 8 blocks or until you hit a solid block, and repeat the thunder attack at your destination, ignoring iframes. Cooldown: 20s.
Damage is increased from 5 to 8. Teleport range is increased from 8 to 10 blocks.

Within 3s of casting, use the same trigger to return to the original starting location, dealing 20% of the skill's damage. If you do not do so, your next Thunder Step within 30s will paralyze enemies for 5s.

skills.name: Prismatic Shield
descriptions: When your health drops below 3 hearts you receive 4 absorption health which lasts up to 12s. If damage taken would kill you but could have been prevented by up to 4 times this skill's absorption, it will save you from death. In addition enemies within 4 blocks are knocked back. Cooldown: 90s.
The shield is improved to 8 absorption health. Enemies within 4 blocks are knocked back and stunned for 1s.

After Prismatic Shield is activated, in the next 5s, you deal 30% more damage and every spell that deals damage to at least one enemy will heal you for 5% of your max health. Additionally, 5s will be reduced from your abilities' cooldowns.

specSkills.name: Astral Omen
descriptions: Dealing spell damage to an enemy marks its fate, giving it an omen based on the spell type (Arcane, Fire, Ice, Thunder). If an enemy hits 2 omens of different types, its fate is sealed, clearing its omens and causing a magical implosion, dealing 7 magic damage to it and all enemies within 3 blocks. An enemy loses all its omens after 10s of it not gaining another omen. That implosion's damage ignores iframes and itself cannot apply omens. Omens cannot be applied or sealed by Elemental Arrows.
The implosion now pulls all enemies inwards. Enemies hit by the implosion now take 15% more damage from you for 8s.

specSkills.name: Cosmic Moonblade
descriptions: Swap while holding a wand to cause a wave of arcane blades to hit every enemy within a 5 block cone 2 times in rapid succession. Each slash deals 5 arcane magic damage and reduces all your other skill cooldowns by 5% (Max 0.5s) if it hits at least one mob. Cooldown: 8s.
Cooldown reduction is increased to 10% (Max 1s) per blade and damage is increased to 7.

If an active spell hits an enemy, you gain an Arcane Insight. Insights stack up to 8, but decay every 4s of not gaining one. Once 8 Insights are revealed, the cooldowns of the previous 2 spells cast is refreshed. This sets your Insights back to 0.
Sage's Insight now refreshes the cooldowns of your previous 3 spells, upon activating.

specSkills.name: Blizzard
descriptions: Right click while sneaking, looking upwards, and holding a wand to create a storm of ice and snow that follows the player, dealing 3 ice magic damage every second to all enemies in a 7 block radius around you. The blizzard lasts for 10s, and chills enemies within it, slowing them by 25%. Players in the blizzard are extinguished if they are on fire, and the ability's damage bypasses iframes. This ability does not interact with Spellshock. Cooldown: 30s.
Damage is increased from 3 to 5, aura size is increased from 7 to 10 blocks, slowness increased to 30%.

specSkills.name: Fire Elemental Spirit
descriptions: Two spirits accompany you - one of fire and one of ice. The next moment after you deal fire damage, the fire spirit instantly dashes from you towards the farthest enemy that spell hit, dealing 10 fire magic damage to all enemies in a 1.5-block cube around it along its path. The next moment after you deal ice damage, the ice spirit warps to the closest enemy that spell hit and induces an extreme local climate, dealing 4 ice magic damage to all enemies in a 3-block cube around it every second for 3s. If the spell was Elemental Arrows, the fire spirit does an additional 25% of the projectile weapon's original damage, and for the ice spirit, an additional 10%. The spirits' damage ignores iframes. Independent cooldown: 8s.

Fire spirit damage is increased from 10 to 15. Ice spirit damage is increased from 4 to 6. Bonus Elemental Arrows damage is increased from 25% to 40% for the fire spirit, and from 10% to 15% for the ice spirit.

specSkills.name: Starfall
descriptions: While holding a wand, pressing the swap key marks where you're looking, up to 25 blocks away. You summon a falling meteor above the mark that lands strongly, dealing 15 fire magic damage to all enemies in a 6 block radius around it, setting them on fire for 5s, and knocking them away. Cooldown: 18s.
Damage is increased from 15 to 27.

skills.name: Advancing Shadows
descriptions: While holding two swords and not sneaking, right click to teleport to the target hostile enemy within 10 blocks and gain +30% Melee Damage for 5 seconds. Cooldown: 20s.
Damage increased to +40% Melee Damage for 5s, teleport range is increased to 15 blocks and all hostile non-target mobs within 4 blocks are knocked away from the target.
If the mob you teleported to dies within 1s, you can recast Advancing Shadows again in the next 4s.

skills.name: By My Blade
descriptions: While holding two swords, attacking an enemy with a critical attack deals an extra 12 melee damage to that enemy, and grants you Haste II for 4s. Cooldown: 10s.
Damage is increased from 12 to 24. Haste level is increased from II to IV.
By My Blade does 20% extra damage. Killing an enemy with this ability heals you for 5% of your max health, increased to 15% if the target was an elite or boss.

skills.name: Dagger Throw
descriptions: Sneak left click while holding two swords to throw three daggers which deal 4 melee damage and gives each target 20% Vulnerability for 10 seconds. The daggers travel up to 8 blocks. Cooldown: 12s.
The damage is increased to 8 and the Vulnerability increased to 40%.
Targets are additionally silenced for 2s. Vulnerability is increased by 10%.

skills.name: Dodging
descriptions: Blocks an arrow, thrown potion, blaze fireball, or snowball that would have hit you. Cooldown: 12s.
The cooldown is reduced to 10s. When this ability is triggered, you gain +20% Speed for 15s.
The projectile you dodged is now reflected back to the enemy at 3x damage.

skills.name: Escape Death
descriptions: When taking damage leaves you below 5 hearts, throw a paralyzing grenade that stuns all enemies within 5 blocks for 3 seconds. Cooldown: 60s.

When this skill is triggered, also gain 4 absorption health for 8 seconds, 30% Speed, and Jump Boost III. If damage taken would kill you but could have been prevented by this skill it will instead do so.
When this skill is triggered, gain a regenerating effect that heals you for 5% hp every second for 4s. The effect is canceled if you take damage from an enemy.

skills.name: Skirmisher
descriptions: When dealing melee damage to a mob that has at least one other mob within 2.5 blocks, deal + 1 + 10% final damage.
The damage bonus now also applies to mobs not targeting you, and the damage bonus is increased to 2 + 15% final damage done.
When you hit an enemy with a sword, the nearest enemy within 3 blocks takes 30% of the original attack's damage.

skills.name: Smokescreen
descriptions: When holding two swords, right-click while sneaking and looking down to release a cloud of smoke, afflicting all enemies in a 6 block radius with 8s of 20% Weaken and 20% Slowness. Cooldown: 20s.
The Weaken debuff is increased to 40%.
Leave a 4 block radius persistent cloud on the ground for 8 seconds after activating. Enemies in the cloud gain the same debuffs for 2 seconds, pulsing every second.

skills.name: Vicious Combos
descriptions: Passively, killing an enemy refreshes the cooldown of your abilities by 1 second. Killing an Elite or Boss enemy instead resets the cooldown of your abilities.
Killing an enemy now refreshes your ability cooldowns by 2 seconds. Killing an Elite or Boss enemy inflicts nearby enemies within 5 blocks with 15% weaken and 15% Vulnerability for 5 seconds.
When an ability goes on cooldown, your next melee attack in 3s deals 10% more melee damage and that ability's cooldown is refreshed by 1s, prioritizing the last ability.

specSkills.name: Blade Dance
descriptions: When holding two swords, press the drop key to enter a defensive stance, parrying all attacks and becoming invulnerable for 0.75 seconds. Afterwards, unleash a powerful attack that deals 6 melee damage to enemies in a 5 block radius. Damaged enemies are rooted for 2 seconds. Cooldown: 18s.
The area attack now deals 9 damage and roots for 2.5s. Cooldown: 16s.

specSkills.name: Deadly Ronde
descriptions: After casting a skill, gain a stack of Deadly Ronde for 5 seconds, stacking up to 2 times. While Deadly Ronde is active, you gain 20% Speed, and your next melee attack consumes a stack to fire a flurry of blades, that fire in a thin cone with a radius of 4.5 blocks and deal 4 melee damage to all enemies they hit.
Damage increased to 6, and you can now store up to 3 stacks.

specSkills.name: Wind Walk
descriptions: Press the swap key while holding two swords to dash in the target direction, stunning and levitating enemies for 2 seconds. Elites are not levitated. Cooldown: 25s. Charges: 2.
Casting this ability reduces the cooldown of all other abilities by 4 seconds. Cooldown: 20s.

specSkills.name: Bodkin Blitz
descriptions: Sneak right click while holding two swords to teleport 10 blocks forwards. Gain 1 second of Stealth upon teleporting. Upon teleporting, your next melee attack deals 7 bonus damage if your target is not focused on you. Cooldown: 20s. Charges: 2.
Range increased to 14 blocks, Stealth increased to 1.5 seconds. Upon teleporting, your next melee attack deals 14 bonus damage if your target is not focused on you. Cooldown: 18s.

specSkills.name: Cloak And Dagger
descriptions: When you kill an enemy you gain a stack of cloak. Elite kills and Boss "kills" give you 5 stacks (every 300 damage to them in R2; every 450 damage to them in R3). Stacks are capped at 8. When you press the drop key with dual wielded swords, you lose your cloak stacks and gain 2.5 seconds of Stealth and (2 * X) extra damage on your next stealth attack, where X is the number of stacks you had at activation. This attack ends stealth. You must have at least 4 stacks to activate this.
Cloak stacks are now capped at 12 and bonus damage is increased to (3 * X) where X is the number of stacks you have upon activating this skill.

specSkills.name: Coup de Grace
descriptions: If melee damage you deal brings a normal mob under 15% health, they die instantly. The threshold for elites is 20% health.
The health threshold is increased to 20% for normal enemies and 30% for elites.
You gain permanent Haste I. Your melee damage is increased by +1.
You gain permanent Haste II. Increase melee damage by +1 plus 10% of final damage done.
Breaking a spawner refreshes the cooldown of all your skills by 5%.

skills.name: Hunting Companion
descriptions: Swap hands while holding a projectile weapon to summon an invulnerable fox companion. The fox attacks the nearest mob within 32 blocks. The fox prioritizes the first enemy you hit with a projectile after summoning, which can be reapplied once that target dies. The fox deals damage equal to 20% of your mainhand's projectile damage, amplified by both melee and projectile damage from gear. Once per mob, the fox stuns upon attack for 2 seconds, except for elites and bosses. When a mob that was damaged by the fox dies, you heal 5% of your max health. The fox disappears after 12 seconds. Triggering while on cooldown will clear the specified target. If used while in water, an axolotl is spawned instead, and if used while in lava, a strider is spawned instead. Cooldown: 24s.
Damage is increased to 30% of your projectile damage and the stun time is increased to 3 seconds.

Also summon an invulnerable eagle (parrot). The eagle deals the same damage as the fox and targets similarly, although the two will always avoid targeting the same mob at once. The eagle can swoop towards its target. The eagle applies 20% Bleed for 5s instead of stunning, which can be reapplied on a mob. If used in water, a dolphin is spawned instead.

skills.name: Eagle Eye
descriptions: When you left-click while sneaking you reveal all enemies in a 24 block radius, giving them the glowing effect for 10 seconds. Affected enemies have 20% Vulnerability. If a mob under the effect of Eagle Eye dies the cooldown of Eagle Eye is reduced by 2 seconds. This skill can not be activated if you have a pickaxe in your mainhand. Cooldown: 24s.
The effect is increased to 35% Vulnerability.
Your first attack against every enemy affected by this ability will deal 15% extra damage.

skills.name: Wind Bomb
descriptions: Press the swap key while sneaking and holding a projectile weapon to throw a projectile that, upon contact with the ground or an enemy, deals 40% of your projectile damage to mobs in a 3 block radius and launches them into the air, giving them Slow Falling and 20% Weaken for 4s. Cooldown: 15s.
The damage is increased to 50% of your projectile damage and the cooldown is reduced to 10s. Additionally, you passively deal 15% more damage to airborne enemies.
On impact, generate a vortex that pulls mobs within 10 blocks toward the center for 3 seconds.
Your projectiles deal 25% more damage.

Each enemy hit with a critical projectile gives you a stack of Sharpshooter, up to 8. Stacks decay after 5 seconds of not gaining a stack. Each stack makes your projectiles deal an additional +4% damage. Additionally, passively gain a 20% chance to not consume arrows when shot.
Your projectiles deal an extra 1.5% damage per block of distance between you and the target, up to 16 blocks.
Attacking an enemy with a fully charged valid melee weapon attack grants you a Swift Cuts stack with a maximum of 3 stacks. Every stack grants you +5% melee damage. Stacks decay by 1 after 5 seconds.
Maximum stacks increased to 6.
Additional effect applies while having maximum Swift Cuts stacks. Tactical Maneuver: -30% Cooldown, Whirling Blade: +30% Damage and Radius, Predator Strike: -20% Cooldown, Split Arrow: +1 Bounce

skills.name: Swiftness
descriptions: Gain +20% Speed when you are not inside a town.
In addition, gain Jump Boost III when you are not inside a town.
You now have a 15% chance to dodge any projectile or melee attack.

skills.name: Volley
descriptions: When you shoot a projectile while sneaking, you shoot a volley consisting of 7 projectiles instead. Only one arrow is consumed, and each projectile deals 30% bonus damage. Cooldown: 15s.
Increases the number of projectiles to 11 and enhances the bonus damage to 50%.
Volley now fires in a 360 degree arc. The projectiles inflict 10% Bleed for 4s.

specSkills.name: Quickdraw
descriptions: Left-clicking with a projectile weapon instantly fires that projectile, fully charged. This skill can only apply Recoil once before touching the ground. Cooldown: 6s.
Arrows shot with this skill are given +1 piercing. Cooldown: 3s.

specSkills.name: Whirling Blade
descriptions: Use the swap key while holding a weapon to throw a whirling blade that circles around you, knocking back and dealing 9 melee damage to enemies it hits and inflicts 30% weakness and 20% slowness for 3s. Cooldown: 6s. Charges: 2.
The damage is increased to 18 and also stun for 0.75s.

specSkills.name: Tactical Maneuver
descriptions: Press the drop key while not sneaking to dash forward, dealing 14 damage to the first enemy hit, and stunning it and all enemies in a 3 block radius for 1 second. Press the drop key while sneaking to leap backwards, dealing 8 damage to enemies in a 3 block radius and knocking them away. Cooldown: 10s. Charges: 2.
Cooldown: 8s. Charges: 3.

specSkills.name: Pinning Shot
descriptions: The first time you shoot a non-boss enemy, pin it for 2.5s. Pinned enemies are afflicted with 100% Slowness and 30% Weaken (Bosses receive 30% Slowness and no Weaken). Shooting a pinned non-boss enemy deals 10% of its max health on top of regular damage and removes the pin. A mob cannot be pinned more than once.
Weaken increased to 60% and bonus damage increased to 20% max health.

specSkills.name: Split Arrow
descriptions: When you hit an enemy with an arrow, the next nearest enemy within 5 blocks takes 35% of the original arrow damage (ignores invulnerability frames).
Damage to the second target is increased to 60% of the original arrow damage.

specSkills.name: Predator Strike
descriptions: Left-clicking with a projectile weapon while not sneaking will prime a Predator Strike that unprimes after 5s. When you fire a critical projectile, it will instantaneously travel in a straight line for up to 30 blocks or until it hits an enemy or block and damages enemies in a 1.25 block radius. This ability deals 200% of your projectile damage increased by 10% for every block of distance from you and the target (up to 12 blocks, or 320% total). Cooldown: 18s.
Damage now increases by 15% for each block of distance (up to 380% in total). Cooldown: 14s.

skills.name: Cleansing Totem
descriptions: Left click while holding a melee weapon and sneaking to fire a projectile that summons a Cleansing Totem. Players within 6 blocks of this totem heal for 6% of their maximum health per second. No chargeup time, Duration: 8s. Cooldown: 30s.
Duration is increased to 12s and now cleanses debuffs for players 2 times evenly throughout it's duration.
Throwing the totem cleanses the shaman and heals 20% max health instantly. Players within 3 blocks of the landing location receive the same effects on impact.

skills.name: Totemic Projection
descriptions: Press swap with a projectile weapon to fire a projectile that, on landing, moves all active totems to within 3 blocks of it. 6s cooldown.
Slow mobs near the projectile landing spot by 20% for 3s within a 6 block radius on hit. 4s cooldown.
For every totem affected by this ability, the Shaman gets +15% Attack/Projectile damage for 6s.

skills.name: Flame Totem
descriptions: Right click while holding a melee weapon and sneaking to fire a projectile that summons a flame totem. Mobs within 6 blocks of this totem are dealt 4 magic damage and set on fire, without inferno damage, for 2 seconds every second. Charge up time: 1s. Duration: 10s. Cooldown: 22s.
The totem deals 5 magic damage per hit, radius is increased to 7, and duration is extended to 12s.

The totem now throws explosive fireballs at a target every second that deal 2 extra magic damage in a 3.0 block radius and set mobs on fire for 2 seconds instead of the base skill's approach. Applies inferno at 50% efficiency.

skills.name: Interconnected Havoc
descriptions: Totems form a line between them with a maximum distance of 10, and mobs that cross those lines are dealt 5 magic damage per second within that line.
Magic damage is increased to 7, and the maximum distance is now 16.
Mobs are now knocked back from the player when coming in contact with the line for the first time and are stunned for 0.5s.

skills.name: Lightning Totem
descriptions: Press the drop key while holding a melee weapon and not sneaking to fire a projectile that summons a Lightning Totem. The totem will target a mob within 7 blocks with priority towards boss and elite mobs and deal 14 magic damage every 2 seconds. Charge up time: 1s. Duration: 10s. Cooldown: 22s.
The totem deals 21 magic damage per hit.

If the totem kills a mob outside of an existing storm, it spawns a lightning storm at the mob's location. The lightning storm will deal 35% of the main magic damage to all mobs within 2 blocks of the center every 2 seconds.

skills.name: Chain Lightning
descriptions: Right click while holding a melee weapon to cast a splitting beam of lightning, bouncing between up to 2 mobs within 6 blocks of the last target hit and dealing 5 damage to each. Will also bounce to nearby totems without consuming a hit target. 2 charges, 6s cooldown.
Damage increased to 7 and now hits 4 targets.
Now causes each totem it bounces off of to instantly pulse it's effects at 50% efficiency for damaging totems and 30% efficiency for the rest.

skills.name: Earthen Tremor
descriptions: Press swap with a weapon while sneaking to summon an earthen tremor on your position. Deals 10 magic damage to mobs within 7 blocks and pushes them away. Cooldown: 10s.
Damage increased to 13 and silences targets for 1.5s.
Tremor now sends out an additional 6 shockwaves from the edge of the radius outwards for an additional 5 blocks with a radius of 3 blocks. Damage is increased by 2.5

skills.name: Crystalline Combos
descriptions: Every kill not caused by this skill grants you 1 stack of crystals, and after 12 stacks the crystals lash out at any mobs within 12 blocks of you at a rate of 1 shot per 0.6s, dealing 7 damage to each for a total of 16 shots. Stacks decay at a rate of 1 stack per 8s.
Damage is increased to 10, number of shots increased to 20, stack decay rate is reduced to 1 stack per 12s.

Pressing swap while sneaking and holding a projectile weapon will use all existing crystal stacks to provide 4% speed per stack (max 90%) to the Shaman for 6s. Decay rate reduced to 1 stack per 16s. Can now target outside of line of sight. Cooldown 4s.

specSkills.name: Sanctuary
descriptions: Mobs within the range of one of your totems receive 15% slowness and 20% weakness debuffs while within range.
Additionally inflicts 10% vulnerability while within range.

specSkills.name: Whirlwind Totem
descriptions: Press the swap key while holding a melee weapon and not sneaking to fire a projectile that summons a Whirlwind Totem. Every 2s, all players in a 5 block radius have their class cooldowns reduced by 2.5% (maximum 1s). Cannot decrease the cooldown on any player's whirlwind totem, and does not stack with other whirlwind totems. Additionally, apply a 25% duration boost to other totems existing at any point in this totem's duration. Charge up time: 1s. Duration: 8s. Cooldown: 26s.
Totem duration increased to 12s, and now gives 10% speed to players within range.

specSkills.name: Chain Healing Wave
descriptions: Punch while holding a projectile weapon to cast a beam of healing, bouncing between up to 4 players within 10 blocks of the last target hit and healing for 25% of their health. Will also bounce to nearby totems, decreasing their cooldowns by 1.5s without consuming a heal. 15s cooldown.
Heal is increased to 35%, range between bounces has increased to 15, and can now heal up to 6 targets.

specSkills.name: Desecrating Shot
descriptions: Upon hitting a mob with a fully charge projectile, apply 15% weakness for 6s and deal 40% magic damage of the projectile's damage in a 4 block radius. 4s cooldown.
Damage is increased to 60% of your bow shot and weaken increased to 30%.

specSkills.name: Decayed Totem
descriptions: Press the swap key while holding a melee weapon and not sneaking to fire a projectile that summons a Decayed Totem. The totem anchors up to 3 targets within 8 blocks of the totem, inflicting 4 magic damage per second and 30% Slowness. Additionally grants 1 damage to your flame totems and 5 damage to your lightning  totems that exist during this totem's duration. Charge up time: 1s. Duration: 8s. Cooldown: 26s.
Damage now ticks every half second, and duration is increased to 12s.

specSkills.name: Devastation
descriptions: Punch while holding a projectile weapon to destroy the nearest totem, dealing 23 magic damage within a 6 block radius of the totem. The totem's cooldown is reduced by 3s. Cooldown: 15s
Magic damage is increased to 28 and the radius is increased to 8 blocks.

skills.name: Amplifying Hex
descriptions: Left-click while sneaking with a scythe to fire a magic cone up to 8 blocks in front of you, dealing 2 + (0.5 * number of Skill Points, capped at the maximum available Skill Points for each Region) magic damage to each enemy per debuff (potion effects like Weakness or Wither, as well as Fire and custom effects like Bleed) they have, and an extra +1 damage per extra level of debuff, capped at 2 extra levels. 10% Slowness, Weaken, etc. count as one level. Cooldown: 10s.
The range is increased to 10 blocks, extra damage increased to +2 per extra level, and the extra level cap is increased to 3 extra levels.
For every 1% health you have above 80% of your max health, Amplifying Hex will deal 1.25% more damage to enemies and deal 1% max health damage to yourself.
For each spell on cooldown, gain +1.5% Damage Reduction and +0.5 Knockback Resistance.
Increase to +2.5% Damage Reduction per spell on cooldown, and players within 7 blocks are given 33% of your bonuses. (Does not stack with multiple Warlocks.)

All non-ailment damage taken is instead converted into a short Damage-over-Time effect. A third of the damage stored is dealt every second for 3s. Each time this stored damage is dealt, deal 5% of the initial damage to all mobs in a 3 block radius.

skills.name: Choleric Flames
descriptions: Sneaking and right-clicking while not looking down while holding a scythe knocks back and ignites mobs within 9 blocks of you for 7s, additionally dealing 3 magic damage. Cooldown: 10s.
The damage is increased to 5, and also afflict mobs with Hunger I.

Mobs ignited by this ability are inflicted with an additional level of Inferno for every two debuffs they have (rounded down) prior to this ability, up to 2. Additionally, when these mobs die, they explode, applying all Inferno they have at the time of death to all mobs within a 3.0 block radius for 5s.

skills.name: Cursed Wound
descriptions: Attacking an enemy with a critical scythe attack passively afflicts it and all enemies in a 3 block radius around it with 1 damage every second for 6s. Your melee attacks passively deal 5% more damage per ability on cooldown, capped at 3 abilities.
Your melee attacks passively deal 10% more damage per ability on cooldown instead.

When you kill a mob with a melee scythe attack, all debuffs on the mob get stored in your scythe. Then, on your next melee scythe attack, all mobs within 3 blocks of the target are inflicted with the effects stored in your scythe, as well as 3% of your melee attack's damage as magic damage per effect.

skills.name: Melancholic Lament
descriptions: Press the swap key while sneaking and holding a scythe to recite a haunting song, causing all mobs within 8 blocks to target the user and afflicting them with 20% Weaken for 8 seconds. Cooldown: 16s.
Increase the Weaken to 30% and decrease the duration of all negative potion effects on players in the radius by 10s.
For 8s after casting this ability, you and your allies in a 16 block radius gain +2.5% melee damage for each mob in that same radius targeting you (capped at 6 mobs).

skills.name: Grasping Claws
descriptions: Pressing the drop key while sneaking and holding a scythe or projectile weapon fires a projectile that pulls nearby enemies towards it once it makes contact with a mob or block. Mobs caught in the projectile's 8 block radius are given 20% Slowness for 8 seconds and take 3 magic damage. Cooldown: 16s.
The pulled enemies now take 8 damage, and their Slowness is increased to 30%.

When the projectile lands, an impenetrable cage is summoned at its location. Non-boss mobs within a 6 block radius of the location cannot enter or exit the cage, and players within the cage are granted 5% max health healing every second. The cage disappears after 6 seconds. Mobs that are immune to crowd control cannot be trapped.

triggers.restriction: holding a scythe or projectile weapon

skills.name: Sanguine Harvest
descriptions: Enemies you damage with an ability are afflicted with Bleed I for 10 seconds. Bleed gives mobs 10% Slowness and 10% Weaken per level if the mob is below 50% Max Health. Additionally, right click while holding a scythe and not sneaking to fire a burst of darkness. This projectile travels up to 8 blocks and upon contact with a surface or an enemy, it explodes, knocking back all mobs within 3 blocks. Any player that kills a mob knocked back by this ability is healed for 5% of max health. Cooldown: 20s.
Increase passive Bleed level to II, and increase the radius to 4 blocks. Healing from killing affected mobs is increased to 10%.

Sanguine now seeps into the ground where it lands, causing blocks in the cone to become Blighted. Mobs standing on these Blighted blocks take 3% extra damage per debuff. The Blight disappears after 6s and is not counted as a debuff.

skills.name: Soul Rend
descriptions: Attacking an enemy with a critical scythe attack heals you for 2 health and 20% of the melee damage dealt, capped at 10 total health. Cooldown: 8s.
Players within 7 blocks of you are now also healed. Flat healing is increased from 2 to 4 health.
Healing above max health, as well as any healing from this skill that remains negated by Dark Pact, is converted into Absorption, up to 4 absorption health, for 2.5s.

specSkills.name: Dark Pact
descriptions: Pressing the drop key while not sneaking and holding a scythe causes a dark aura to form around you. For the next 7 seconds, your scythe attacks deal +35% melee damage. Each kill during this time increases the duration of your aura by 1 second and gives 1 absorption health (capped at 6) for the duration of the aura. However, the player cannot heal for 7 seconds, and reduced healing by -66.67% until the aura ends. Cooldown: 14s.

Attacks with a scythe deal +55% melee damage, and Soul Rend bypasses the healing prevention, healing the player by +2/+4 HP, depending on the level of Soul Rend. Nearby players are still healed as normal.

specSkills.name: Judgement Chain
descriptions: Press the swap key while not sneaking targeting a non-boss hostile mob to conjure an unbreakable chain, linking the Reaper and the mob. For the next 20s, long as another mob is within 8 blocks, the mob becomes immortal and can only target or damage the Reaper, is slowed by 25%, and deals 50% less damage. All damage taken by the chained mob is passed to the nearest mob in 8 blocks. All debuffs on the chained mob are inverted to their positive counterpart and transferred to the Reaper for 10s, capped at 10%. Pressing swap while a mob is already chained will pull it towards you, dealing 20 magic damage and breaking the chain. Walking 16+ blocks away will deal damage but not pull the mob. Cooldown: 25s.

While a mob is chained, the reaper gains 10% damage resistance. When breaking the chain, apply all the positively inverted debuffs to other players and all debuffs (capped at 10%) to other mobs in an 8 block radius of the player for 10s. Additionally, deal 20 magic damage to all mobs in a 4 block radius of the player.

specSkills.name: Voodoo Bonds
descriptions: Melee strikes to a mob apply 15% of the damage to all mobs of the same type within 3 blocks. Additionally, right-click while sneaking and looking down to cast a protective spell on all players within an 8 block radius. The next hit every player (including the Reaper) takes has all damage ignored (or 50% if attack is from a Boss), but that damage will transfer to the Reaper in 5s unless it is passed on again. Passing that damage requires a melee strike, in which 33% of the initial damage blocked is added to the damage of the strike (Bosses are immune to this bonus). The damage directed to the Reaper is calculated by the percentage of health the initial hit would have taken from that player, and can never kill you, only leave you at 1 HP. Cooldown: 22s.
The duration before damage transfer increases to 7s, the on-hit damage when passing a hit increases to 67% of the blocked damage, and the cooldown is reduced to 12s.

specSkills.name: Haunting Shades
descriptions: Press the swap key while not sneaking with a scythe to conjure a Shade at the target block or mob location. Mobs within 6 blocks of a Shade are afflicted with 10% Vulnerability. A Shade fades back into darkness after 7 seconds. Cooldown: 10s.

Players within 6 blocks of the shade are given 10% damage dealt and gain a custom healing effect that regenerates 2.5% of max health every second for 1 second. Effects do not stack with other Tenebrists.

specSkills.name: Restless Souls
descriptions: Whenever an enemy dies within 8 blocks of you, a glowing invisible invulnerable vex spawns. The vex targets your enemies and possesses them, dealing 10 damage to the target and silences all mobs within 0.25 blocks for 2 seconds. Vex count is capped at 3 and each lasts for 15 seconds. Each vex can only possess 1 enemy. Enemies killed by the vex will not spawn additional vexes.

Damage is increased to 15 and silence duration increased to 3 seconds. Maximum vex count increased to 5. Additionally, the possessed mob is inflicted with a level 1 debuff of the corresponding active skill that is on cooldown for 4 seconds. Grasping Claws > 10% Slowness. Level 1 Choleric Flames > Set mobs on Fire. Level 2 Choleric Flames > Hunger. Melancholic Lament > 10% Weaken. Withering Gaze > Wither. Haunting Shades > 10% Vulnerability.

specSkills.name: Withering Gaze
descriptions: Pressing the drop key while not sneaking and holding a scythe unleashes a 9 block long cone in the direction the player is facing. Enemies in its path are stunned for 3 seconds (elites and bosses are given 100% Slowness instead) and dealt 1 damage every half second for 6 seconds. Cooldown: 30s.
Your damage over time lasts for 8 seconds. Cooldown: 20s.

skills.name: Brute Force
descriptions: Attacking an enemy with a critical attack passively deals 2 more damage to the mob and 2 damage to all enemies in a 2 block radius around it, and knocks all non-boss enemies away from you.
Damage is increased to 10% of the attack's damage plus 2.
Half a second after triggering this ability, it triggers another wave centered on the same mob, with 75% of the damage and all of the knockback.

skills.name: Counter Strike
descriptions: When a mob attacks you (even if the attack is blocked or negated), a Counter Strike is primed against that mob, which lasts up to 4s. Hitting a mob with a Counter Strike deals 10% more damage and removes the Counter Strike.
Damage bonus is increased to 20%. Additionally, the first time you taunt a given mob using an ability, a Counter Strike is primed against that mob.

Take 10% less damage from a mob that has a Counter Strike primed against them. If the Counter Strike was primed while you had absorption active, take 12.5% less damage instead, and gain 50% Knockback Resistance while the Counter Strike is active. Also, when dealing a Counter Strike, apply 10% Bleed for 8s to mobs in a 2 block radius.

skills.name: Defensive Line
descriptions: When you block while sneaking, you and your allies in an 8 block radius gain 20% Resistance for 10 seconds. Upon activating this skill mobs in a 3 block radius of you and your allies are knocked back. Cooldown: 30s.
The effect is increased to 30% Resistance.
Additionally, all affected players negate the next melee attack dealt to them within the duration.
Gain +30% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after killing a mob.
Gain +40% Attack Speed and +20% Speed for 5 seconds after killing a mob.
Additionally, your next melee damage within 5 seconds after getting a kill deals 15% extra damage.

skills.name: Riposte
descriptions: While wielding a sword or axe, you block a melee attack that would have hit you. Cooldown: 15s.

Cooldown lowered to 12s and if you block an attack with Riposte's effect while holding a sword, your next sword attack within 2s deals double damage. If you block with Riposte's effect while holding an axe, the attacking mob is stunned for 3s.
When Riposte activates, deal 15.0 melee damage to all mobs in a 4.0 block radius and root them for 1.5s.

skills.name: Shield Bash
descriptions: Block while looking at an enemy within 4 blocks and not sneaking to deal 8 melee damage, stun for 1 second, and taunt the targeted enemy. Elites and bosses are rooted instead of stunned. Cooldown: 8s.
Additionally, apply damage, stun, and taunt to all enemies in a 3 block radius from the enemy you are looking at.
Blocking damage with a shield within 1s of beginning to block refreshes 50% of this skill's cooldown.
Gain +10% max health and damage from Poison, Wither, and Drowning is reduced by 20%.
Gain +20% max health and damage from Poison, Wither, and Drowning is reduced by 40%.
Gain an additional +5% max health. Additionally, when below 50% health, gain 20% healing.
You gain 10% damage resistance while holding a sword. Additionally, your axe damage is increased by +2 plus 5% of final damage done.
Increase axe damage by +4 plus 10% of final damage done and increase sword damage by +1 plus 10% of final damage done.
Deal +7.5% final damage when using either an axe or a sword. Gain +15% speed when using an axe. Apply 10% weaken for 4s when using a sword.

specSkills.name: Glorious Battle
descriptions: Dealing indirect damage with an ability grants you a Glorious Battle stack. Shift and swap hands to consume a stack and charge forwards at 1.3 blocks per second, gaining full knockback resistance until landing. Vertical movement speed is capped at 0.3 blocks per second upwards. When you land, deal 20 damage to the nearest mob within 3.0 blocks. Additionally, knock back all mobs within 3.0 blocks.
Damage is increased to 25. Velocity is increased to 1.6. Vertical speed cap is removed.

specSkills.name: Meteor Slam
descriptions: Pressing the swap key grants you Jump Boost 4 for 2s. Cooldown: 8s. Falling more than 3 blocks passively generates a slam when you land, dealing melee damage to all enemies in a 2 block radius around you. Falling increases the damage scaling per block fallen by +1.0 melee damage linearly, starting at +1.0 damage for the first block fallen and capping at +4 melee damage per block fallen. The damage scaling per block fallen is reduced by 90% after the initial 5.0 blocks. If any enemies are damaged by a slam, you take no fall damage from that fall.

Jump Boost level is increased from 4 to 5. Cooldown is reduced from 8s to 6s. Damage size is increased from 2 to 3 blocks. Reduction threshold is increased from 5.0 to 5.5 blocks. Damage scaling per block fallen is increased from +1.0 to +1.25, starting at +1.25 for the first block fallen and capping at +5 melee damage per block fallen instead.

specSkills.name: Rampage
descriptions: Gain a stack of rage for each 50 melee damage dealt (100% more in Region 3). Stacks decay by 1 every 5 seconds of not dealing melee damage and cap at 15. Passively gain 0.75% damage resistance for each stack. When at 10 or more stacks, right click while looking down to consume all stacks and damage mobs in a 4.0 block radius by 1.5 times the number of stacks consumed. For the next (stacks consumed / 2) seconds, heal 2.5% of max health per second and keep your passive damage reduction.
Gain a stack of rage for each 35 melee damage dealt, with stacks capping at 20.

specSkills.name: Bodyguard
descriptions: Left-click the air twice while looking directly at another player within 25 blocks to charge to them (cannot be used in safezones). Upon arriving, knock away all mobs within 4 blocks. Both you and the other player gain 8 absorption health for 10 seconds. Left-click twice while looking down to cast on yourself. Cooldown: 30s.
Absorption increased to 12 health. Additionally, affected mobs are stunned for 3 seconds.

specSkills.name: Challenge
descriptions: Left-clicking while sneaking makes all enemies within 14 blocks target you. You gain 1 Absorption per affected mob (up to 4 Absorption) for 10 seconds and +15% melee damage for 10 seconds. Cooldown: 20s.

You gain 2 Absorption per affected mob (up to 8 Absorption) and +20% melee damage instead. When 6 affected mobs (or all if there are fewer) are dead, for each mob, gain +4% speed for 10 seconds and reduce the cooldown of Guardian skills by 0.5 seconds.

specSkills.name: Shield Wall
descriptions: Press the swap key while holding a shield in either hand to create a 180 degree arc of particles from 1 block below to 5 blocks above the user's location and with a 4 block radius in front of the user. Enemies that pass through the wall are dealt 3 melee damage and knocked back. The wall also blocks all enemy projectiles such as arrows or fireballs. The wall lasts 6 seconds. Triggering while active will reposition the wall with the remaining duration minus 0.5s. Cooldown: 30s.
The shield lasts 10 seconds instead. Cooldown: 18s.

triggers.restriction: holding a shield in either hand
